document_data.mainbody:
he House of Hope was a temple to Tymora the Luckbringer found in the city of Tantras in the Vast in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
The House of Hope lay on the north side of the Market in the center of Tantras.
During the Time of Troubles in the Year of Shadows, 1358 DR, the deity Torm resided at his temple in Tantras. Torms zealous priests began persecuting followers of other faiths as "unbelievers", and the unlucky House of Hope was left with a dearth of material and spiritual resources.
Nevertheless, the House of Hope remained active through to 1367 DR and past 1370 DR.
Circa 1358 DR, the temple was led by High Priestess Lashaera Thindol, with five priests and eight lay-followers.
